<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- New Features
  - Initiated the Farm v2.0.0 (beta) release line.

- Chores
  - Added changesets and pre-release config to manage a coordinated 2.0.0 rollout across Rust crates and JS packages (nightly tags updated).
  - Migrated release automation to release-plz with separate PR and release jobs.
  - Updated package dependencies to workspace:* where applicable.
  - Renamed example packages under the @farmfe-examples scope.
  - Performed widespread version bumps to 2.0.0 across core, plugins, and utilities.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

candidates.title: feat: write generate resource and some utils
candidates.body:
#1793

1. add output file print log
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/98b9e58e-93ed-49cb-af58-5647c4c4f217)


3. add writeBundle 
4. prepare out dir logic move to rust side 
    - create out_dir dir
    - copy public dir
    - filter resource.emitter === true
5. add rust side logger
6. add some toolkit utils

candidates.title: chore: release
candidates.body:
## 🤖 New release * `farmfe_compiler`: 0.0.15 -> 0.0.16 (✓ API compatible changes) * `farmfe_core`: 0.7.2 -> 0.7.3 (✓ API compatible changes) * `farmfe_plugin_script`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 (✓ API compatible changes) * `farmfe_swc_transformer_import_glob`: 0.0.15 -> 0.0.16 (✓ API compatible changes) * `create-farm`: 0.1.4 -> 0.1.5 (✓ API compatible changes) * `create_farm_node`: 0.1.4 -> 0.1.5 * `farmfe_bench`: 0.0.5 -> 0.0.6 * `farmfe_plugin_bundle`: 0.0.8 -> 0.0.9 * `farmfe_testing_helpers`: 0.0.16 -> 0.0.17 * `farmfe_toolkit`: 0.0.16 -> 0.0.17 * `farmfe_toolkit_plugin_types`: 0.0.23 -> 0.0.24 * `farmfe_plugin_css`: 0.0.16 -> 0.0.17 * `farmfe_plugin_define`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_html`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_json`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_lazy_compilation`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_minify`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_partial_bundling`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_polyfill`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_progress`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_resolve`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_runtime`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_static_assets`: 0.0.14 -> 0.0.15 * `farmfe_plugin_tree_shake`: 0.0.13 -> 0.0.14
Changelog

## `farmfe_compiler`

## [0.0.16](https://github.com/farm-fe/farm/compare/farmfe_compiler-v0.0.15...farmfe_compiler-v0.0.16) - 2025-01-09 ### Fixed - module with query cannot update when watch file update (#2046) - import meta glob path failed (#2049)
## `farmfe_core`
## [0.7.3](https://github.com/farm-fe/farm/compare/farmfe_core-v0.7.2...farmfe_core-v0.7.3) - 2025-01-09 ### Fixed - module with query cannot update when watch file update (#2046)
## `farmfe_plugin_script`
## [0.0.15](https://github.com/farm-fe/farm/compare/farmfe_plugin_script-v0.0.14...farmfe_plugin_script-v0.0.15) - 2025-01-09 ### Fixed - import meta glob path failed (#2049)

## [0.0.16](https://github.com/farm-fe/farm/compare/farmfe_swc_transformer_import_glob-v0.0.15...farmfe_swc_transformer_import_glob-v0.0.16) - 2025-01-09 ### Fixed - import meta glob path failed (#2049)
## `create-farm`
## [0.1.5](https://github.com/farm-fe/farm/compare/create-farm-v0.1.4...create-farm-v0.1.5) - 2025-01-09 ### Other - delete react template warning code (#2041)
## `create_farm_node`
## 0.0.17 ### Patch Changes - 5c656009: chore: delete react template warning code
## `farmfe_bench`
## [0.0.6](https://github.com/farm-fe/farm/compare/farmfe_bench-v0.0.5...farmfe_bench-v0.0.6) - 2025-01-09 ### Other - updated the following local packages: farmfe_compiler, farmfe_core
